title.narrative: Rural Development: Northeastern Districts Rural Development Project

description.narrative: The projects seeks to alleviate the immediate symptoms of rural poverty and to mitigate its effects in the longer term by improving agricultural productivity through support for essential rural infrastructure and services. The project:: (a) generates employment and urgently needed cash income through a programme of labour intensive work; (b) develops livestock and off-farm income-generating activities through support for small-scale credit and micro-enterprise development; (c) improves food security through an agricultural development programme; (d) helps establish markets; and, (e) establishes the basis for sustainable long-term rural development by improving the administration of local government. The interventions focus on the introduction of new ideas on farming and off-farm activities, and the development of know-how through training, extension and exchanges with other European countries having a similar physical environment.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Northeastern Districts Rural Development Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
